Class Dictionary

  • Object
    • Dictionary

  • public class Dictionary
extends Object
    Represents a Dictionary containing many words.
    Author:
    Aggeliki Kouroupaki

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dictionary(String fileName)
      This constructs a Dictionary with a specified file name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void putDictionaryToList()
      This reads a file line by line and adds each line (word) to a HashSet.
      HashSet<String> returnDictionaryList()
      This returns a HashSet containing the words of the dictionary.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dictionary

        public Dictionary(String fileName)
        This constructs a Dictionary with a specified file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file that contains the dictionary

    • Method Detail

      • returnDictionaryList

        public HashSet<String> returnDictionaryList()
        This returns a HashSet containing the words of the dictionary.
        Returns:
        the dictionary's words

      • putDictionaryToList

        public void putDictionaryToList()
        This reads a file line by line and adds each line (word) to a HashSet.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if fileName does not exist, ends the program
        IOException - if fileName cannot be read, ends the program
